trackerSubtitle: Add your passport or ID process number and we will pull the latest status and email you when it changes.
loginPrompt: Please sign in to add a tracking number. Your input is saved locally for 15 minutes.
noDocs: No documents added yet. Add your first number above to start tracking.
signInSubtitle: Enter your email address to receive a secure login link.
emailSentDesc: Check your inbox for the magic link to complete sign-in.

errorMessages.INVALID_INPUT: Invalid input. Please check your entry.
errorMessages.RATE_LIMITED: Too many requests. Please wait and try again.
errorMessages.DATABASE_ERROR: Server error. Please try again later.
errorMessages.UNKNOWN_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please try again.

cachedNotice: Your input is saved locally for 15 minutes.
footerNote: This service is provided without guarantee; see terms for details.
disclaimerTitle: Independent from the City of Munich
disclaimerBody: dokustatus is not affiliated with or commissioned by the City of Munich or any authority. Status data is read from publicly available Munich services and provided without guarantee.
disclaimerLinkNote: offers the same status lookup directly.
emailNotEncrypted: Emails are sent unencrypted over standard email!
rateLimitBody: You’ve hit a rate limit. Please wait a bit and try again. If urgent, you can use https://www.muenchen.de/pass directly.
trackRateLimitBody: Too many refreshes for this document. Please wait and try again shortly.
trackingAdded: Tracking added and confirmed. We'll email you on status changes.

IN_BEARBEITUNG.title: Your document is still being processed
IN_BEARBEITUNG.message:
Processing times:
• Express passport: 3–6 business days
• Passport/ID: 4–5 weeks
• eID card: 5–6 weeks

BEREIT_ZUR_ABHOLUNG.title: Your document is ready for pickup

AUSGEHAENDIGT.title: Your document has already been handed out

IN_DIREKTVERSAND.title: Your document was shipped
IN_DIREKTVERSAND.message: Shipped by Bundesdruckerei GmbH, on its way.

DIREKTVERSAND_FEHLGESCHLAGEN.title: Delivery failed
DIREKTVERSAND_FEHLGESCHLAGEN.message: Held at Deutsche Post for 7 days, then returned to Bürgerbüro Ruppertstr. 19.

DOKUMENT_UNBEKANNT.title: The entered document number is unknown
DOKUMENT_UNBEKANNT.message: Check your input and try again.
